mapper.select: select a.shop_id as shopId,a.shop_num as storeNum,b.market_name as market from shigu_shop a,shigu_market b where a.market_id = b.market_id and a.shop_id = ${shopId}

SELECT t1.goods_id goodsId, t1.pic_url imgSrc, t1.title, t1.click + (ifnull(t2.virtual_clicks, 0)) readNum FROM ( SELECT t2.goods_id, t1.pic_url, t1.title, t2.click FROM ( SELECT goods_id,pic_url,title FROM shigu_goods_tiny_${webSite} WHERE store_id = ${shopId} UNION ALL SELECT goods_id,pic_url,title FROM shigu_goods_soldout_${webSite} WHERE store_id = ${shopId} ) t1, goods_count_forsearch t2 WHERE t1.goods_id = t2.goods_id ) t1 LEFT JOIN virtual_flow t2 ON t1.goods_id = t2.goods_id ORDER BY readNum DESC limit ${num}

SELECT t2.`day` text, count(*) `value` FROM ( SELECT goods_id FROM shigu_goods_tiny_${webSite} WHERE store_id = ${shopId} UNION ALL SELECT goods_id FROM shigu_goods_soldout_${webSite} WHERE store_id = ${shopId} ) t1, goods_bogus_records t2 WHERE t1.goods_id = t2.goods_id AND t2.`day` in(${days}) GROUP BY t2.`day`
